name: Brooks Ghost Long Sleeve Top - Men's
description:
A featherweight running top designed to keep you cool. The Ghost Long Sleeve offers a clean silhouette and no-frills, athletic style.Lightweight polyester DryLayer fabric wicks moisture to keep you comfortable and dry.Semi-fitted design contours the body and underarm panels let you move freely.

        Sustainability
